column2: "Mfaso biara nnyi ho mpo a ohia dɛ mehyehyɛ moho naaso mebɛka Ewuradze enyido adzehu nye nyikyerɛ no."
"Minyim nyimpa bi wɔ Kraest mu a mfe duanan nye yi wohwiim no kɔr ɔsor a otsia ebiasa no
column3: (dɛm nyimpa no sɛ ɔwɔ honam mu o

column2: "Na minyim dɛm nyimpa no (sɛ ɔwɔ honam mu o
column8: na ɔkɛtsee nsɛm a wɔnnka a nyimpa biara nnyi ho kwan dɛ ɔka."

column2: "Dɛm nyimpa no afamu na mebɛhyehyɛ moho
"Na sɛ mepɛ dɛ mehyehyɛ moho mpo a
column4: na mebɛkasa nokwar; naaso migyaa yɛ
column5: ama obi eemmbu me annkyɛn mbrɛ ohu me dɛ metse

column2: "Na nyikyerɛ ntrado no ntsi amma maamma moho do anntra do
column6: amma maamma moho do anntra do."

column2: "Na iyi ntsi meserɛɛ Ewuradze mpɛn ebiasa dɛ ɔmma omfi mo do."
"Na ɔsee me dɛ
column3: M'adom dɔɔ so ma wo: na m'ahoɔdzen dzi mu wɔ wo mberɛwyɛ mu. Dɛm ntsi medze enyigye pii hyehyɛ moho mbom wɔ me mberɛwyɛ mu
column4: ama Kraest ahoɔdzen aabɔsoɛ mo do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi minya enyigye wɔ mberɛwyɛ mu
column7: wɔ Kraest ntsi: na meyɛ mberɛw a

column2: "Ana meyɛ kwasea? Nna homara na hom ahyɛ me ma mayɛ. Na emi dze
column3: hom mbom na nkyɛ ɔsɛ dɛ hom kamfo me
column4: osiandɛ sɛ mennsɛ hwee mpo a
column5: woyinom a wɔyɛ asomafo ara ma ɔbor do yi nnkyɛn me wɔ biribiara mu."

column2: "Ampaara medze abotar daa ɔsomafo nsɛnkyerɛdze edzi wɔ hom mu; iyinom nye: nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze nye tum ndwuma."
"Na ebɛnadze mu na hom tɔɔ sin kyɛɛn asɔr nkaa no
column3: gyama mankasa mannyɛ adzesoa amma hom no a? Nna hom mfa mo mfom yi nkyɛ me ɛ!"

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: iyi nye mpɛn ebiasa a mesiesie moho reba hom nkyɛn
column4: na meremmbɛyɛ adzesoa ama hom: na nnyɛ hom adze na morohwehwɛ
column5: na mbom homankasa a: na nnyɛ mba na ɔsɛ dɛ wɔkora ma awofo
column6: na awofo mbom na ɔsɛ dɛ wɔkora ma mba;"

column2: "na emi dze
column4: na mama wɔahwer me ama hom akra. Sɛ modɔ hom mbordo dɛm a
column5: iyi ntsi na hom dɔ me dɔ a osuar yi?"

column2: "Na bi a ɔwɔ mu dɛm: mannyɛ adzesoa amma hom
column3: naaso meyɛ onyitsewfo ntsi medze nyansa mekyeer hom."

column2: "Aso menam hɔn a mosomaa hɔn no bi do medzi hom emim anaa?"
"Meserɛɛ Titus
column3: na mosomaa onua kaa no ho. Ana Titus bedzii hom emim bi? Ana nnyɛ Sunsum kor no ara mu na yɛnantsewee? Nnyɛ anamɔn kor no ara mu anaa?"

column2: "Mber yi nyina hom dwen dɛ yeriyi hɛn ano akyerɛ hom. Yɛkasa Kraest mu wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim. Na
column4: iyi nyina homankasa hom kankɔ ntsi a."

column2: "Na musuro dɛ bɛyɛ na meba a
column4: na hom so ennhu me dɛ mbrɛ hom pɛ; bɛyɛ na bi a aperper

column2: "bɛyɛ so bio na meba a
column3: Nyankopɔn abrɛbrɛ me adze wɔ hom afamu
column4: ama meegyam piinara a wɔyɛɛ bɔn nkan no
column5: na wonnuu hɔnho wɔ hɔn efifidze nye ndwamanyɛ
column6: nye ahoɔdɛw a wɔyɛɛ no ho no."
